item.description: I'm a passionate software engineer with a love for cyberpunk aesthetics and futuristic design. With over 5 years of experience in web development, I create immersive digital experiences that combine cutting-edge technology with stunning visuals.
details: My journey in software development began at the University of Dhaka, where I earned my Bachelor's degree in Computer Science.
I specialize in React, Next.js, Three.js, and Node.js, with a strong focus on creating performant, accessible, and visually stunning user interfaces.
I'm passionate about staying at the forefront of web technology and constantly expanding my skillset to deliver the best possible solutions.

features.title: Clean Code
features.description: Writing elegant, maintainable, and efficient code is my core philosophy.

features.title: AI Integration
features.description: Implementing cutting-edge AI solutions in modern applications.

features.title: Web Expert
features.description: Specializing in modern web technologies and frameworks.

features.title: Performance
features.description: Optimizing for speed, accessibility, and exceptional user experience.

about.description:
I'm a passionate software engineer who loves cyberpunk aesthetics and futuristic design. With over 5 years of experience in web development, I create immersive digital experiences that combine cutting-edge technology with stunning visuals.

My journey in software development began at the University of Dhaka, where I earned my Bachelor's degree in Computer Science.

I specialize in React, Next.js, Three.js, and Node.js, with a strong focus on creating performant, accessible, and visually stunning user interfaces.

I'm passionate about staying at the forefront of web technology and constantly expanding my skillset to deliver the best possible solutions.

item.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
item.description: Graduated with honors, focusing on algorithms, data structures, and web development. Participated in competitive programming contests and led the university's web development club.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Graduated with honors, focusing on algorithms, data structures, and web development. Participated in competitive programming contests and led the university's web development club.

career_summary.description: My career path showcases my growth from a junior developer to a senior position, with a focus on creating exceptional digital experiences.

experience.description: Leading the frontend development team in creating cutting-edge web applications using React, Next.js, and Three.js. Implemented CI/CD pipelines and improved performance by 40%.
responsibilities: Architected and developed scalable frontend solutions for enterprise clients
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews
Implemented design systems and component libraries
Collaborated with UX/UI designers to create intuitive user interfaces

experience.description: Developed full-stack web applications using MERN stack. Created RESTful APIs and implemented authentication systems. Worked closely with clients to gather requirements and deliver solutions.
responsibilities: Built and maintained RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express
Developed responsive frontends with React and Redux
Implemented database schemas and queries using MongoDB
Deployed applications to AWS and managed infrastructure

experience.description: Started as an intern and quickly progressed to a junior developer role. Worked on various client projects, focusing on frontend development with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery.
responsibilities: Developed responsive websites for small to medium businesses
Implemented UI designs from Figma and Adobe XD
Collaborated with the design team to improve user experience

categories.title: Frontend
categories.description: Building responsive and interactive user interfaces with modern frameworks and libraries.

categories.title: Backend
categories.description: Developing robust server-side applications and APIs to power web applications.

categories.title: Database
categories.description: Managing and optimizing databases for efficient data storage and retrieval.

categories.title: DevOps
categories.description: Implementing CI/CD pipelines and managing cloud infrastructure for seamless deployment.

categories.title: Design
categories.description: Creating visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces with a focus on UX/UI principles.

projects.title: Neon City Dashboard
projects.description: A futuristic admin dashboard with data visualization and real-time updates. Features include interactive charts, user management, and a customizable interface.
features: Responsive design for all device sizes
Dark and light mode with cyberpunk aesthetics

projects.title: Cyberpunk 3D Portfolio
projects.description: An interactive 3D portfolio website with WebGL effects and immersive experience. Showcases projects in a virtual 3D space that users can navigate through.
features: Interactive 3D environment built with React Three Fiber
Custom GLSL shaders for visual effects
Accessible fallback for devices without WebGL supportddd

projects.title: Neural Network Visualizer
projects.description: An interactive visualization of neural networks with real-time training data. Allows users to create, train, and visualize neural networks in the browser.

blog.title: Building Immersive 3D Experiences with Three.js and React
blog.excerpt: Learn how to create stunning 3D web experiences by combining the power of Three.js and React. This tutorial covers everything from basic scene setup to advanced animation techniques.
blog.author: Abir

blog.title: Optimizing React Applications for Performance
blog.excerpt: Discover practical techniques to improve the performance of your React applications, from code splitting to memoization and efficient state management.
blog.author: Abir

blog.title: The Future of Web Development: AI Integration
blog.excerpt: Explore how artificial intelligence is transforming web development and how you can leverage AI tools to enhance your development workflow.
blog.author: Abir
